title: Pasta with almond pesto

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper
150g/5½oz shell pasta, cooked according to packet instructions

steps: Place the almonds, garlic, basil, and parsley into a food processor and blend to a smooth paste. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Stir the pesto into the cooked pasta in a serving bowl and serve garnished with the fresh basil sprig.
